notes:
1. Added New web interface with dark mode
  2. Improved update functionality, no more messing with files
  3. Improved Security
  4. Minor bug Fixes

What's Changed

  • Added Adjustment Profiles by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/22
  • Save your adjustments as a profile and switch between your profiles easily
  • Network discovery by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/25
  • When on the same WiFi network vector boards will identify and add links to each other on their webpages (just click the game name)
  • Factory reset by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/34
  • Factory reset now supports clearing all the new features added in this release

Bug Fixes

  • Main 0 4 0 testing by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/32
  • fixing cancel call back logic by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/28
  • Builder tweaks by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/23
  • turn off some of schedule when in AP mode by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/30
  • correct authentication by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/31

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/0.3.0...0.4.4

What's Changed

  • New responsive scoreboard
  • Added System 9 support
  • Added score claim to allow users to enter initials after playing their game, especially for system 9 with no native support for initials
  • Improved forward compatibility

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/0.4.4...1.0.0

What's Changed

  • Added more robust ability to reconnect to WiFi on signal loss @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/45
  • Restructured code to free up Memory @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/43
  • Moved some files to firmware to save memory @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/46

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0

What's Changed

  • Live game scores by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

What's Changed

  • More memory efficient web server @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/48
  • Added toggle to disable claiming scores via the web UI @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/50
  • Added toggle to disable displaying IP on game @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/51

Bug fixes

  • Various bug fixes and tweaks by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/55
  • More robust discovery service by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/49
  • linted all JS code and added linter by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/52

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/1.2.0...1.3.1

  • Added config for Sorcerer_L2 by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/76

Versions

Vector: 1.4.1
Sys11: 1.4.1
WPC: 1.0.0
EM: 0.0.3

What's Changed

This is a big one! We've been working hard this summer to bring you some new functionality, fix and tweak some existing functions and we've been working on our new hardware. Expect new things from us at the Chicago Expo!

Web UI

  • New personal bests leaderboard by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/97
  • Now when you click on the "personal" scores section you can see all personal bests in addition to your normal individual scores
  • Thanks to @romines on pinside for the idea
  • Improved discovery by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/106
  • boards will discover each other on the network much more rapidly and "remember" many more boards than before
  • Added commas to scores @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/93
  • Show release notes next to update button UI @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/99
  • Stream-lined serving of compressed files by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/112

WPC support

  • Midnight Madness control on WPC by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/102
  • Support for additional games on WPC by @paulmullin in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/92
  • Add update checks for WPC hardware compatibility by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/115

Bug fixes

  • Fix browser cache after updates by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/94
  • Handle web page load race conditions by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/108

Development

  • multi-system-build support by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/83
  • Fix update check JS and backend by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/89
  • Add auto board detection and flashing by @mullinmax in https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/pull/122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/warped-pinball/vector/compare/1.3.10...1.4.1
